original_text: But I tell you this. Even one wild flower is more beautiful than King Solomon was. And King Solomon wore the most beautiful clothes.
korean_text: 그러나 내가 너희에게 말하노니 솔로몬의 모든 영광으로도 입은 것이 이 꽃 하나만 같지 못하였느니라

sentences.original_text: is more beautiful than King Solomon was
And King Solomon wore the most beautiful clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬 왕은 가장 아름다운 옷을 입었다
